name: Laundry Service
description:
Laundry Service is a full-service marketing agency offering content creation, media buying, and influencers, all under one roof. Brands like Amazon, Beats Electronics, BMW, Hennessy, LG Electronics, and Nike work with Laundry Service to achieve their business goals through premium, authentic content and strategic distribution.
Laundry Service was named to Ad Age's 2017 Agency A-List for its commitment to innovation, and its unique ability to handle all aspects of content creation and distributionâ€”24/7.
